text: Baidu map privacy policy
You are welcome to use the services provided by Baidu Map!
Baidu (this privacy policy refers to Beijing Baidu Net News Technology Co., Ltd., also known as "we") attaches great importance to your privacy protection and personal information protection.
This privacy policy is suitable for access and use of various services provided by Baidu Maps in any way.

You can search for road conditions information, merchant information, and position your location through Baidu Maps, carry out path planning, navigation address you want to go, search for surrounding services, etc. (hereinafter collectively referred to as "Baidu Map Products or Service").
We will only handle personal information you need to use products or services.

This privacy policy is applicable to your web page, mobile terminals (including but not limited to APP, applet), software development tool packs (SDK) and application programming interface (API) for third -party websites and applications for third -party websites and applications.As well as smart hardware terminals including the aforementioned products and services (such as watches, car navigators, smart rearview mirrors, etc.) to access and use our products and services.
Baidu maps include but not limited to multiple application versions such as iOS and Android. Please select a version that matches the installed terminal equipment when using Baidu Map.
The personal information that Baidu Maps may get depends on the Baidu map application version you use, the specific type/version of the terminal equipment you use, and the functions you use.

This privacy policy aims to help you understand which personal information we will collect, why these personal information is collected, what these personal information will use what these personal information do and how to protect these personal information.

We will follow your personal information in accordance with your personal information, but we will not collect all your personal information in a compulsory binding method just because you authorize the consent of the privacy policy.

Attachment: term explanation

Personal information refers to the various information related to the recognized or recognizable natural person recorded in electronics or other methods, excluding information after anonymous processing.

Personal information includes names, date of birth, ID number, personal biometric information, address, communication and communication contact information, communication records and content, account passwords, property information, credit information, travel information, accommodation information, health and physiological information, transactions, transactions, transactions, transactions, transactions, transactions, transactionsInformation, etc.

Sensitive personal information refers to personal information that can easily cause the personality and dignity of natural persons to be infringed or harmed by personal and property security, including biometrics, religious beliefs, specific identities, medical health, financial accounts, trajectory trajectory and other informationAnd personal information under minor at the age of 14.
Device refers to devices that can be used to use Baidu products and/or services, such as desktop devices, tablets or smartphones.

Equipment information refers to the device attribute information you use to install and run the Baidu map device (such as your hardware model, operating system version and system situation, device configuration, international mobile device identity code IMEI, international mobile user recognition code IMSI, IMSI,Network device hardware address Mac, advertising identifier IDFA, supply trademark identification IDFV, mobile device recognition code Meid, anonymous device identifier OAID, Andriod ID and other equipment identifiers), device connection information (such as the type of browser, telecommunications operator, telecommunications operator, Language, WIFI information), and device status information (such as device application installation list).

Log information refers to the requests that our server automatically records your requests when visiting Baidu Maps, such as your IP address, the type of browser and the language of the use of hardware equipment, the version of the operating system, the information of the network operator, the information of the network operatorThe date, time, and length of your access to the service are provided, formed or reserved when you use our products or services.

Cookie refers to a mechanism that supports the server (or script) to store and retrieve information on the client. By adding a simple and persistent client state to expand the web -based client/server application.
The server sends a status information while returning the HTTP object to the client, and is stored by the client.
The state information shows the effective URL range in this state.
Since then, the HTTP request within this range initiated by the client will return the current value of the status information from the client to the server. This state information is called Cookie.

Location information refers to the accurate location information obtained by GNSS information, WLAN access points, Bluetooth, base stations, and other sensor information, as well as rough geographical location information obtained through the IP address.

User portraits refer to analysis or predictions of personal characteristics of a certain natural person through collecting, gathering, and analyzing personal information, such as their occupations, economy, health, education, personal preferences, credit, behavior, etc., to form their personal characteristic modelEssence
Use personal information of specific natural persons to form a characteristic model of the natural person, called direct user portraits.
The use of personal information from specific natural persons, such as the data of its group, forms a characteristic model of the natural person, called indirect user portraits.
Decoration refers to the process of processing personal information, so that it cannot recognize a specific natural person without using additional information.
Anonymous refers to the process that the personal information subject cannot be recognized by the technical processing of personal information, and the processing information cannot be restored.
The information obtained by personal information after anonymous processing does not belong to personal information.

Baidu platform refers to the special channels or platform services of Baidu Company (including Baidu search, Baidu APP and derivative version, Baidu Encyclopedia, Baidu Tieba, Baidu mobile assistant and other Baidu products https://www.baidu.com/more/) and other websites, programs, services, tools and clients.
A related company refers to the single name or collecting name of the operator of Baidu Map Beijing Baidu Net News Technology Co., Ltd. and other companies that have related relationships with Baidu.

"Related relationship" refers to the subject (including individuals, companies, partnerships, organizations, or other entities), that is, the subject that directly or indirectly controls, or the subject that controls it directly or indirectlyMaster controlled by the same subject.

The aforementioned "control" means that through holding voting rights, contracts or other methods, directly or indirectly have the power or other relationships that instructions or instructions that to instructions to make instructions by others.
